{"id":1393764456,"question_id":3307,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1726615252,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"508 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1393764456/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Maximum Sum of Node Values","memory":"190.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    const static int MX = 2e4 + 4;\n    vector<long long> adj_list[MX], arr;\n    vector<int> num;\n    vector<vector<long long>> dp;\n    vector<bool> visited;\n    int N, K;\n\n    void dfs(int i) {\n        visited[i] = true;\n\n        dp[i][0] = num[i];\n        dp[i][1] = -LLONG_MAX/3;\n        for (int j : adj_list[i]) {\n            if (!visited[j]) {\n                vector<long long> tmp = dp[i];\n\n                dfs(j);\n                dp[i][1] = max({tmp[1] + dp[j][0], tmp[1] + dp[j][1],\n                                tmp[0] + dp[j][0] + arr[i] + arr[j], \n                                tmp[0] + dp[j][1] + arr[i] - arr[j]});\n                dp[i][0] = max({tmp[0] + dp[j][0], tmp[0] + dp[j][1],\n                                tmp[1] + dp[j][0] - arr[i] + arr[j], \n                                tmp[1] + dp[j][1] - arr[i] - arr[j]});\n            }\n        }\n    }\n\n    long long maximumValueSum(vector<int>& nums, int k,\n                              vector<vector<int>>& edges) {\n        num = nums;\n        N = (int)nums.size(), K = k;\n        for (auto i : edges) {\n            adj_list[i[0]].push_back(i[1]);\n            adj_list[i[1]].push_back(i[0]);\n        }\n        visited = vector<bool>(N, false);\n        dp = vector<vector<long long>> (N, vector<long long>(2, 0));\n        arr = vector<long long>(N, 0);\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++)\n            arr[i] = ((nums[i]^K) - nums[i]);\n        \n        dfs(0);\n        return max(dp[0][0], dp[0][1]);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-maximum-sum-of-node-values","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
